706272f.title: Brooklyn: Pierrepont Street - Clinton Street
706272f.text:
Pierrepont Street, west from Clinton Street. At the left is the Long
Island Historical Society's Building, and at the right is the Crescent Ath-
letic Club.  This club was erected on the site of Benjamin D. Sillman's
tavern, called ''Cant Peek''.
1927.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
706272f.folder: Pierrepont Street & Clinton Street, Brooklyn, NY

706273f-a.title: Brooklyn: Pierrepont Street - Clinton Street
706273f-a.text:
Pierrepont Street, at the N.E. corner of Clinton Street, showing the
''Brooklyn Savings Bank''. No. 147 Pierrepont Street, is the 4-story bank
building to the right of the bank, which is No. 135.
About 1912.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
tAY BE REPPODUCED.
706273f-a.folder: Pierrepont Street & Clinton Street, Brooklyn, NY

706274f-a.title: Brooklyn: Pierrepont Street - Clinton Street
706274f-a.text:
135-165 Pierrepont Street north side, from Clinton to Fulton Streeta.
View, covering Nos. 135-161, shows the Brooklyn Savings Bank (No. 135)
at Clinton Street in the background.
June 2, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
) CS ,
NO REPRODUCTIONS.  NES : 4S2S
The same; showing only Nos. 156-165. The B.M.T. elevated lines
on Fulton Street are seen running toward the East River.
June 2, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

703655f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clinton Street - Pierrepont Street
703655f-a.text:
Clinton Street, east side, at and south of Pierrepont Street.
Also shown is Pierrepont Street, south side, east of Clinton Street.
Now (1929) the ''Brookiyn Trust Co.'' occupies the corner of Pierrenont
Street and southward on Clinton Street to Nontague Street. The corner
building facing Pierrepont Street was occupied at one time, by the
Brooklyn Club which was organized in 1865; later in 1914 the Club
was removed to 131 Remsen Street. Prior to the occupation of the
building by the Club, it as occupied by the Greenleaf Female
Institute.
1914.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
703655f-a.folder: Clinton Street & Pierrepont Street, Brooklyn, NY
